channel.title: Icons help
channel.description:
I went to the clients cache with toms cache editor and edited out piety, smite, retribution, redemption, and chivalry. I set the images to a blank image. The client still loads the smite and such, but how do I remove that? I heard it's in class 9 or somewhere near. I already coded out the prayers from the source so that's not a problem. Anyone know how to erase those extra images? If you can also tell me, I would like to know how to move each prayer icon to make it 3*4 without the ones I deleted.
[img]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j349/Mariano_FlyyBucci/rsps/help.png[/img]

item.title: Icons help
item.dc:creator: @Reamm28 Reamm28
item.description:
